response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and expectations. Given its value and quality, it's worth $12,000 to you. To make this opportunity more appealing, I propose a special introductory price of $10,800. This offer is exclusive to you and includes an additional year of warranty support. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 10800}
